item.title: Generate Hugo website and host it on GitHub
item.description: Introduction GitHub pages is convient and easy enough for hosting your blogging website by Jekyll. But if you like to generate static website using alternatives - Hugo for example, here is a brief. This repository host source code for generating my static HTML pages by Hugo. Website Repository Stored in static website repository. Website Location chaoscosmos.github.io Way of Working Install Hugo Please refer to Hugo Quick Start for details.
